GE07bhg4c12u:1: arjuna uvāca evaṃ satata-yuktā ye bhaktās tvāṃ paryupāsate |
GE07bhg4c12u:2: ye cāpy akṣaram avyaktaṃ teṣāṃ ke yoga-vittamāḥ ||1||
GE07bhg4c12u:5: śreyaḥ katarad ity etan nirṇetuṃ dvādaśodyamaḥ ||
GE07bhg4c12u:6: pūrvādhyāyānte mat-karma-kṛn mat-parama [Gītā 11.55] ity evaṃ bhakti-niṣṭhasya śreṣṭhatvam uktam |
GE07bhg4c12u:8: ādinā ca tatra tatra tasyaiva śreṣṭhatvaṃ nirṇītam |
GE07bhg4c12u:10: nitya-yukta eka-bhaktir viśiṣyata [Gītā 7.17] ity ādinā sarvaṃ
GE07bhg4c12u:11: jñāna-plavenaiva vṛjinaṃ santariṣyasi [Gītā 4.36] ity ādinā ca
GE07bhg4c12u:14: viśeṣa-jijñāsayā śrī-bhagavantaṃ praty arjuna uvāca evam iti |
GE07bhg4c12u:16: sarva-karmārpaṇādinā satata-yuktās tvan-niṣṭhāḥ santo ye bhaktās tvāṃ
GE07bhg4c12u:18: ye cāpy akṣaraṃ brahmāvyaktaṃ nirviśeṣam upāsate |
GE07bhg4c12u:23: nirvairaḥ sarva-bhūteṣu yaḥ sa mām eti pāṇḍava || [Gītā 11.55] ity uktam |
GE07bhg4c12u:24: tatra mac-chabdārthe sandehaḥ kiṃ nirākāram eva sarva-svarūpaṃ vastu
GE07bhg4c12u:25: mad-chabdenoktaṃ bhagavatā kiṃ vā sākāram iti |
GE07bhg4c12u:28: bahūnāṃ janmanām ante jñānavān māṃ prapadyate |
GE07bhg4c12u:29: vāsudevaḥ sarvam iti sa mahātmā sudurlabhaḥ || [Gītā 7.19]
GE07bhg4c12u:32: nāhaṃ vedair na tapasā na dānena na cejyayā |
GE07bhg4c12u:33: śakya evaṃ-vidho draṣṭuṃ dṛṣṭavān asi māṃ yathā || [Gītā 11.53]
GE07bhg4c12u:37: tatraivaṃ sati mayā mumukṣuṇā kiṃ nirākāram eva vastu cintanīyaṃ kiṃ vā sākāram iti svādhikāra-niścayāya
GE07bhg4c12u:38: sa-guṇa-nirguṇa-vidyayor viśeṣa-bubhutsayā arjuna uvāca evam iti |
GE07bhg4c12u:41: sākāra-vastv-eka-śaraṇāḥ santas tvām evaṃ-vidhaṃ sākāraṃ ye paryupāsate
GE07bhg4c12u:44: na kṣaraty aśnute vety akṣaram etad vai tad akṣaraṃ gārgi brāhmaṇā abhivadanty asthūlam anaṇv ahrasvam adīrgham [BAU 3.8.9] ity
GE07bhg4c12u:47: sarva-karaṇāgocaraṃ nirākāraṃ tvāṃ paryupāsate teṣām ubhayeṣāṃ madhye ke
GE07bhg4c12u:49: yogaṃ samādhiṃ vindanti vidantīti vā yoga-vida ubhaye 'pi |
GE07bhg4c12u:50: teṣāṃ madhye ke śreṣṭhā yoginaḥ keṣāṃ jñānaṃ mayānusaraṇīyam ity arthaḥ ||1||
GE07bhg4c12u:56: śraddhāvān bhajate yo māṃ sa me yuktatamo mataḥ || [Gītā 6.47]
GE07bhg4c12u:58: tathaivopasaṃhāre 'pi tasyā evaṃ sarvotkarṣaṃ śrotu-kāmaḥ pṛcchati |
GE07bhg4c12u:60: mat-paramaḥ [Gītā 11.55] iti tvad-ukta-lakṣaṇā bhaktās tvāṃ śyāmasundarākāraṃ ye ca avyaktaṃ nirviśeṣam akṣaraṃ etad vai tad akṣaraṃ gārgi brāhmaṇā abhivadanty asthūlam anaṇv ahrasvam [BAU 3.8.9] ity
GE07bhg4c12u:62: teṣām ubhayeṣāṃ yoga-vidāṃ madhye ke 'tiśayena yogavidaś ca tva-prāntau śreṣṭham upāyaṃ jānanti na labhante vā
GE07bhg4c12u:63: | te yoga-vittarā iti vaktavye yoga-vittamā ity uktir yoga-vittarāṇām api bahūnāṃ madhye ke yogavittamā ity arthaṃ bodhayati ||1||
GE07bhg4c12u:66: prāpayet tvarayā yan mām ity āha dvādaśe hariḥ ||
GE07bhg4c12u:67: jīvātmānaṃ yathāvaj jñātvā vijñāya ca tad-aṃśī harir dhyeya iti avināśi tu tad viddhi [Gītā 2.17] ity ādibhir dvitīyādiṣv ekaḥ panthā varṇitaḥ |
GE07bhg4c12u:68: jīvātmānaṃ harer aṃśaṃ jñātvaiva tad-aṃśī haris tac-chravaṇādi-bhaktibhir
GE07bhg4c12u:69: dhyeya iti mayy āsakta-manāḥ pārtha [Gītā 7.1] ity ādibhiḥ saptamādiṣu
GE07bhg4c12u:71: teṣv eva prayāṇa-kāle [Gītā 8.10] ity ādinā yogopasṛṣṭā |
GE07bhg4c12u:72: jñāna-yajñena cāpy anye [Gītā 9.15] ity anena jñānopasṛṣṭā
GE07bhg4c12u:74: bhakti-ṣaṭkāt prāk ṣaṣṭhānte kevalāṃ bhaktim upadekṣyatā yoginām api sarveṣāṃ [Gītā 6.47] ity ādi-padyena svaikāntinām yuktatamatāṃ cābhihitā |
GE07bhg4c12u:77: [Gītā 7.1] ity ādi-tvad-ukta-vidhayā satata-yuktā ye tvāṃ śyāmasundaraṃ
GE07bhg4c12u:78: kṛṣṇaṃ paritaḥ kāyādi-vyāpārair upāsate, ye cākṣaraṃ jīva-svarūpaṃ
GE07bhg4c12u:80: sākṣāt-kartum īhante paramātma-kāmās teṣām ubhayeṣāṃ madhye yoga-vittamāḥ
GE07bhg4c12u:83: hari-dhyānasya bandha-mūlatvāt tena nirvighnā tat-prāptir ity eke |
GE07bhg4c12u:84: nīrūpasyātisūkṣmasya jīvātmano durdhyānatvāt kiṃ tad-dhyānena ? kintu
GE07bhg4c12u:86: tasyām eva niratās teṣām ubhayeṣām upāyeṣu kaḥ śreyān upāya iti taṃ bhaṇeti ||1||
GE07bhg4c12u:88: śrī-bhagavān uvāca mayy āveśya mano ye māṃ nitya-yuktā upāsate |
GE07bhg4c12u:89: śraddhayā parayopetās te me yuktatamā matāḥ ||2||
GE07bhg4c12u:90: śrīdharaḥ - tatra prathamāḥ śreṣṭhā ity uttaraṃ śrī-bhagavān uvāca mayīti |
GE07bhg4c12u:93: nitya-yuktā mad-artha-karmānuṣṭhānādinā man-niṣṭhāḥ santaḥ śreṣṭhayā śraddhayā yuktā ye mām ārādhayanti te yuktatamā mamābhimatāḥ ||2||
GE07bhg4c12u:95: viśvanāthaḥ --- tatra mad-bhaktāḥ śreṣṭhā ity āha mayi śyāmasundarākāre mama āveśyāviṣṭaṃ kṛtvā nitya-yuktā man-nitya-yoga-kāṅkṣiṇaḥ parayā guṇātītayā śraddhayā |
GE07bhg4c12u:97: sāttviky ādhyātmikī śraddhā karma-śraddhā tu rājasī |
GE07bhg4c12u:98: tāmasy adharme yā śraddhā mat-sevāyāṃ tu nirguṇā || [BhP 11.25.27] iti |
GE07bhg4c12u:99: te me madīyā ananya-bhaktā yuktatamā yoga-vittamā ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c12u:102: tataś ca jñānād bhaktiḥ śreṣṭhā bhaktāv apy ananya-bhaktiḥ śreṣṭhety upapāditam ||2||
GE07bhg4c12u:103: baladevaḥ - evaṃ pṛṣṭho bhagavān uvāca mayīti |
GE07bhg4c12u:105: nīlotpala-śyāmalatvādi-dharmiṇi svayaṃ bhagavati devakī-sūnau mana āveśya nirataṃ kṛtvā parayā dṛḍhayā śraddhayopetāḥ santo mām ukta-lakṣaṇam
GE07bhg4c12u:109: mad-yogam icchantas te mama matena yuktatamā matāḥ |
GE07bhg4c12u:112: ye tv akṣaram anirdeśyam avyaktaṃ paryupāsate |
GE07bhg4c12u:113: sarvatra-gam acintyaṃ ca kūṭastham acalaṃ dhruvam ||3||
GE07bhg4c12u:115: te prāpnuvanti mām eva sarva-bhūta-hite ratāḥ ||4||
GE07bhg4c12u:116: śrīdharaḥ - tarhītare kiṃ na śreṣṭhā iti ? ata āha ye tv iti dvābhyām |
GE07bhg4c12u:117: ye tv akṣaram paryupāsate dhyāyanti te 'pi mām eva prāpnuvantīti dvayor anvayaḥ |
GE07bhg4c12u:130: yena ta eva yuktatmās tavābhimatā ity apekṣāyāṃ tam atiśayaṃ vaktuṃ tan nirūpakān nirguṇa-brahma-vidaḥ prastauti ye tv iti dvābhyām |
GE07bhg4c12u:132: mām upāsate te 'pi mām eva prāpnuvantīti dvitīya-gatenānvayaḥ |
GE07bhg4c12u:136: vācaknavī-brāhmaṇe prasiddhaṃ tasya samarpaṇāya sapta viśeṣaṇāni |
GE07bhg4c12u:137: anirdeśyaṃ śabdena vyapadeṣṭum aśakyaṃ yato 'vyaktaṃ śabda-pravṛtter
GE07bhg4c12u:143: ataevācintyaṃ śabda-vṛtter iva mano-vṛtter api na viṣayaḥ |
GE07bhg4c12u:147: tarhi kathaṃ taṃ tv aupaniṣadaṃ puruṣaṃ pṛcchāmi iti |
GE07bhg4c12u:148: dṛśyate tv agryayā buddhyā iti ca śrutiḥ |
GE07bhg4c12u:154: atas tatra kalpitam aivdyā-sambandhaṃ pratipādayitum āha kūṭasthaṃ, yan mithyā-bhūtaṃ
GE07bhg4c12u:155: satyatayā pratīyate tat-kūṭam iti lokair ucyate |
GE07bhg4c12u:159: mithyā-bhūtam api laukikaiḥ satyatayā pratīyamānaṃ kūṭaṃ tasminn
GE07bhg4c12u:165: sākṣi-caitanyaṃ nirvikāram ity āha acalaṃ calanaṃ vikāraḥ |
GE07bhg4c12u:167: etādṛśaṃ śuddhaṃ brahma māṃ paryupāsate śravaṇena pramāṇa-gatām asambhāvanām apohya mananena ca prameya-gatām
GE07bhg4c12u:172: kathaṃ punar viṣayendriya-saṃyoge sati vijātīya-pratyaya-tiraskāro 'ta āha saṃniyamya sva-viṣayebhya upasaṃhṛtyendriya-grāmaṃ karaṇa-samudāyam |
GE07bhg4c12u:174: viṣaya-bhoga-vāsanāyāṃ satyāṃ kuta indriyāṇāṃ tato nivṛttis tatrāha
GE07bhg4c12u:175: sarvatra viṣaye samā tulyā harṣa-viṣādābhyāṃ rāga-dveṣābhyāṃ ca rahitā matir yeṣāṃ samyag-jñānena tat-kāraṇasyājñānasyāpanītatvād viṣayeṣu
GE07bhg4c12u:176: doṣa-darśanābhyāsena spṛhāyā nirasanāc ca te sarvatra sama-buddhayaḥ |
GE07bhg4c12u:179: hiṃsā-kāraṇa-dveṣa-rahitatvāt sarva-bhūta-hite ratāḥ abhayaṃ sarva-bhūtebhyo mattaḥ svahā iti mantreṇa datta-sarva-bhūtābhaya-dakṣiṇāḥ
GE07bhg4c12u:180: kṛta-saṃnyāsā iti yāvat abhayaṃ sarva-bhūtebhyo dattvā saṃnyāsam ācaret
GE07bhg4c12u:183: nirvicikitsena sākṣātkāreṇa sarva-sādhana-phala-bhūtena mām akṣaraṃ brahmaiva te prāpnuvanti
GE07bhg4c12u:186: brahmaiva san brahmāpy eti, brahma veda brahmaiva bhavati ity-ādi-śrutibhyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c12u:187: ihāpi ca jñānī tv ātmaiva me matam
GE07bhg4c12u:189: viśvanāthaḥ --- madīya-nirviśeṣa-brahma-svarūpopāsakās tu duḥkhitatvāt tato nyūnā ity āha ye tv iti dvābhyām |
GE07bhg4c12u:197: eka-rūpatayā tu yaḥ kāla-vyāpi sa kūṭasthaḥ ity amaraḥ |
GE07bhg4c12u:201: mām evety akṣarasya tasya matto bhedābhāvāt ||3-4||
GE07bhg4c12u:202: baladevaḥ - ye tu sva-sākṣāt-kṛti-pūrvikāṃ mad-upāsanāṃ na kurvanti, teṣām api mat-prāptiḥ syād eva kintv atikleśenāticireṇaivāntas tebhyo 'pakṛṣṭās
GE07bhg4c12u:203: ta ity āha ye tv iti tribhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c12u:204: ye tv akṣara-svātma-caitanyam eva pūrvam upāsate |
GE07bhg4c12u:206: akṣaraṃ viśinaṣṭi anirdeśyaṃ dehād bhinnatvena dehābhidhāyibhir deva-mānavādi-śabdair
GE07bhg4c12u:211: jñāna-svarūpam eva jñātṛ-svarūpam acalaṃ jñānatvād api calana-rahitam |
GE07bhg4c12u:215: śabdādi-saṃcārebhyas tad-vyāpārebhyaḥ pratyāhṛtya sarvatra suhṛn-mitrāry-udāsīnādiṣu sama-buddhayas tulya-dṛṣṭayaḥ |
GE07bhg4c12u:216: yad vā, sarveṣu cetanācetaneṣu vastuṣu sthite same brahmaṇi buddhir yeṣāṃ bhūtānāṃ hite upakāre ratāḥ sarveṣāṃ śaṃ bhūyād iti yathāyathaṃ yatamānāḥ evaṃ
GE07bhg4c12u:218: pravartante, te 'pi mām eva pāramaiśvarya-pradhānaṃ prāpunuvantīti nāsti saṃśayaḥ ||3-4||
GE07bhg4c12u:221: avyaktā hi gatir duḥkhaṃ dehavadbhir avāpyate ||5||
GE07bhg4c12u:222: śrīdharaḥ - nanu ca te 'pi cet tvām eva prāpnuvanti tarhītareṣāṃ yuktatamatvaṃ kuta ity apekṣāyāṃ kleśākleśa-kṛtaṃ viśeṣam āha kleśa iti tribhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c12u:223: avyakte nirviśeṣe 'kṣara āsaktaṃ ceto yeṣāṃ teṣāṃ kleśo 'dhikataraḥ |
GE07bhg4c12u:224: hi yasmād avyakta-viṣayā gatir niṣṭhā dehābhimānibhir
GE07bhg4c12u:227: madhusūdanaḥ - idānīm etebhyaḥ pūrveṣām atiśayaṃ darśayann āha kleśa iti |
GE07bhg4c12u:228: pūrveṣām api viṣayebhya āhṛtya saguṇe mana-āveśe satataṃ
GE07bhg4c12u:229: tat-karma-parāyaṇatve ca para-śraddhopetatve ca kleśo 'dhiko bhavaty eva |
GE07bhg4c12u:232: atra svayam eva hetum āha bhagavān -- avyaktā hi gatiḥ |
GE07bhg4c12u:233: hi yasmād akṣarātmakaṃ gantavyaṃ phala-bhūtaṃ brahma duḥkhaṃ yathā syāt tathā kṛcchreṇa dehavadbhir deha-mānibhir avāpyate |
GE07bhg4c12u:234: sarva-karma-saṃnyāsaṃ kṛtvā gurum upasṛtya vedānta-vākyānāṃ tena tena vicāreṇa
GE07bhg4c12u:236: pratyakṣa-siddhas tataḥ kleśo 'dhikataras teṣām ity uktam |
GE07bhg4c12u:237: yadyapy ekam eva phalaṃ tathāpi ye duṣkareṇopāyena prāpnuvanto bhavanti śreṣṭhā ity abhiprāyaḥ
GE07bhg4c12u:238: viśvanāthaḥ --- tarhi kenāṃśena teṣām apakarṣas tatrāha kleśa iti |
GE07bhg4c12u:239: na kenāpi vyajyata ity avyaktaṃ brahma tatraivāsakta-cetasāṃ tad evānububhūṣūṇāṃ teṣāṃ tat-prāntau kleśo 'dhikataraḥ |
GE07bhg4c12u:240: hi yasmād avyaktā gatiḥ kenāpi prakāreṇa vyaktībhavatisā gatir dehavadbhir jīvair duḥkhaṃ yathā bhavaty evam avāpyate |
GE07bhg4c12u:245: indriyāṇāṃ nirodhas tu srotasvatīnām iva sroto-nirodho duṣkara eva |
GE07bhg4c12u:251: kleśo mahān iha bhavārṇavam aplaveśāṃ ṣaḍ-varga-nakram asukhena titīrṣanti |
GE07bhg4c12u:252: tat tvaṃ harer bhagavato bhajanīyam aṅghriṃ kṛtvoḍupaṃ vyasanam uttara dustarārṇam || [BhP 4.22.40] iti |
GE07bhg4c12u:253: tāvatā kleśenāpi sā gatir yadyapy avāpyate |
GE07bhg4c12u:255: bhagavati bhaktiṃ vinā kevala-brahmopāsakānāṃ tu kevala-kleśa eva lābho na
GE07bhg4c12u:258: teṣām asau kleśala eva śiṣyate nānyad yathā sthūla-tuṣāvaghātinām |
GE07bhg4c12u:260: baladevaḥ - nanu te 'pi cet tvām eva prāpnuyus tarhi pūrveṣāṃ
GE07bhg4c12u:264: tat-tan-mad-bhakty-asaṅga-samācāro mad-anya-viṣayebhyaḥ karaṇānāṃ pratyāhāraś ca kleśo 'sty eva, tathāi tatrānanda-mūrter mama sphuraṇān na
GE07bhg4c12u:267: gatir avyaktākṣara-viṣayā mano-vṛttir dehavadbhir dehābhimānibhir janair
GE07bhg4c12u:269: dehavantaḥ khalu sthūla-deham eva sucirād ātmatvenānuśīlitavantaḥ katham aṇu-caitanyaṃ sucirojjhita-vimarśam
GE07bhg4c12u:273: tatra saguṇopāsanam ākāravad-viṣayatvāt sukaram apramādaṃ ca |
GE07bhg4c12u:274: nirguṇopāsanaṃ tu tattvābhāvād duḥkha-karaṃ sa-pramādaṃ ca |
GE07bhg4c12u:277: nairguṇya-pratipattaye sapta viśeṣaṇāni anirdeśyaṃ vedāgocaraṃ, yato 'vyaktaṃ jātyādi-śūnyam
GE07bhg4c12u:280: śrutiś ca - yato vāco nivartante aprāpya manasā saha [TaittU 2.4.1] ity ādyā |
GE07bhg4c12u:281: kūṭasthaṃ mithā-bhūtam api satyavat pratītaṃ jagat kūṭam ucyate |
GE07bhg4c12u:285: acaram avikāram ato dhruvaṃ nityam iti |
GE07bhg4c12u:295: yathā tad akṣaram adhigamyate iti tasya veda-vedyatva-śravaṇāt |
GE07bhg4c12u:297: pravṛtti-nimittābhāvena nirguṇasyāpramāṇatvāt taucchyāc ca lakṣyatvaṃ tu na, sarva-śabda-vācyatva-svīkārāt
GE07bhg4c12u:298: sadaikāvasthasya vastunaḥ kūṭasthatvenābhidhānān na ca jagat kūṭam |
GE07bhg4c12u:299: kavir manīṣī paribhūḥ svayambhur yāthātathyato 'rthān vyadadhāc chāśvatībhyaḥ samābhyaḥ [Īśopaniṣad
GE07bhg4c12u:304: ye tu sarvāṇi karmāṇi mayi saṃnyasya mat-parāḥ |
GE07bhg4c12u:307: bhavāmi na cirāt pārtha mayy āveśita-cetasām ||7||
GE07bhg4c12u:308: śrīdharaḥ - mad-bhaktānāṃ tu mat-prasādād anāyāsenaiva siddhir bhavatīty
GE07bhg4c12u:310: ye mayi parameśvare sarvāṇi karmāṇi saṃnyasya samarpya mat-parā bhūtvā |
GE07bhg4c12u:316: evaṃ mayy āveśitaṃ ceto yais teṣām |
GE07bhg4c12u:320: syātāṃ, tad eva tu nāsti nirguṇa-brahma-vidāṃ hi phalam avidyā-tat-kārya-nivṛttyā nirviśeṣa-paramānanda-bodha-brahma-rūpatā
GE07bhg4c12u:323: ataḥ phalādhikyārtham āyāsādhikyaṃ na nyūnatām āpādayatīit cet, na suguṇopāsanayā nirasta-sarva-pratibandhānāṃ vinā gurūpadeśaṃ vinā ca
GE07bhg4c12u:327: sa etasmāj jīva-ghanāt parātparaṃ puriśayaṃ puruṣam īkṣate iti śruteḥ sa
GE07bhg4c12u:329: sarva-jīva-samaṣṭi-rūpāt parāc chreṣṭhād dhiraṇyagarbhāt paraṃ vilakṣaṇaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ ca puriśayaṃ sva-hṛdaya-guhā-niviṣṭaṃ puruṣaṃ pūrṇaṃ pratyag-abhinnam advitīyaṃ paramātmānam īkṣate svayam āvirbhūtena vedānta-pramāṇena sākṣātkaroti, tāvatā ca mukto bhavatīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c12u:330: tathā ca vināpi prāg-ukta-kleśena saguṇa-brahma-vidām īśvara-prasādena
GE07bhg4c12u:331: nirguṇa-brahma-vidyā-phala-prāptir itīmam artham āha ye tv iti dvyābhyām |
GE07bhg4c12u:333: ye sarvāṇi karmāṇi mayi saṃnyasya saguṇe vāsudeve samarpya mat-parā ahaṃ bhagavān vāsudeva eva paraḥ prakṛṣṭaḥ prīti-viṣayo yeṣāṃ te tathā santo 'nanyenaiva yogena na vidyate
GE07bhg4c12u:334: māṃ bhagavantaṃ muktvānyad-ālambanaṃ yasya tādṛśenaiva yogena
GE07bhg4c12u:336: sakala-saundarya-sāra-nidhānam ānanda-ghana-vigrahaṃ dvibhujaṃ caturbhujaṃ vā samasta-jana-mano-mohinīṃ muralīm antimanoharaiḥ saptabhiḥ svarair āpūrayantaṃ vā dara-kamala-kaumodakī-rathāṅga-saṅgi-pāṇi-pallavaṃ vā
GE07bhg4c12u:337: narasiṃha-rāghavādi-rūpaṃ vā yathā-darśita-viśva-rūpaṃ vā dhyāyanta upāsate samānākāram avicchinnaṃ citta-vṛtti-pravāhaṃ saṃtanvate
GE07bhg4c12u:338: samīpa-vartitayā 'sate tisṭhanti vā tesāṃ mayy āveśita-cetasāṃ mayi yathokta āveśitam ekāgratayā praveśitaṃ ceto yais teṣām ahaṃ satatopāsito bhagavān mṛtyu-saṃsāra-sāgarām mṛtyu-yukto yaḥ saṃsāro mithyā-jñāna-tat-kārya-prapañcaḥ sa eva sāgarā iva duruttaras tasmāt
GE07bhg4c12u:339: samuddhartā samyag anāyasenordhve sarva-bādhāv adhibhūte śuddhe brahmaṇi
GE07bhg4c12u:340: dhartā dhārayitā jñānāvaṣṭambha-dānena bhavāmi na cirāt kṣipram eva tasminn eva janmani
GE07bhg4c12u:342: viśvanāthaḥ --- bhaktānāṃ tu jñānaṃ vinaiva kevalayā bhaktyaiva sukhena saṃsārān muktir ity āha ye tv iti |
GE07bhg4c12u:343: mayi yat prānty arthaṃ saṃnyasya tyaktvā saṃnyāsa-śabdasya tyāgārthatvāt |
GE07bhg4c12u:345: jñāna-karma-tapasyādi-rahitenaiva yogena bhakti-yogena yad uktaṃ yat
GE07bhg4c12u:346: karmabhir yat tapasā jñāna-vairāgyataś ca yat [BhP 11.20.32] ity anantaram |
GE07bhg4c12u:348: svargāpavargaṃ mad-dhāma kathañcid yadi vāñchati || [BhP 11.20.33] iti |
GE07bhg4c12u:349: nanu tad api teṣāṃ saṃsāra-taraṇe kaḥ prakāra iti cet ? satyaṃ |
GE07bhg4c12u:353: vinaivāham eva tāṃs tārayiṣyāmīty āha teṣām iti |
GE07bhg4c12u:354: tena bhagavato bhakteṣv eva vātsalyaṃ na tu jñāniṣv iti dhvaniḥ ||6-7||
GE07bhg4c12u:355: baladevaḥ - tathātma-yāthātmyaṃ śrutvaivātmāṃśino mama kevalāṃ bhaktiṃ ye kurvanti, na tv ātma-sākṣātkṛtaye prayatante, teṣāṃ tu kevalayā
GE07bhg4c12u:356: mad-bhaktyaiva mat-prāptir acireṇaiva syād ity āha ye tv iti dvābhyām |
GE07bhg4c12u:358: mad-ekāntino mayi mat-prāpty-arthaṃ sarvāṇi sva-vihitāny api karmāṇi saṃnyasya bhakti-vikṣepakatva-buddhyā parityajya mat-parā
GE07bhg4c12u:361: tal-lakṣaṇāṃ mad-upāsanāṃ kurvanti dhyāyantaḥ śravaṇādi-kāle 'pi man-niviṣṭa-manasaḥ |
GE07bhg4c12u:362: teṣāṃ mayy āveśita-cetasāṃ mad-ekānurakta-manasāṃ bhaktānām aham eva mṛtyu-yuktāt
GE07bhg4c12u:365: tat-prāpti-vilambāsahamānas tān ahaṃ garuḍa-skandham āropya sva-dhāma
GE07bhg4c12u:367: nayāmi paramaṃ sthānam arcir ādi-gatiṃ vinā |
GE07bhg4c12u:368: garuḍa-skandham āropya yatheccham anivāritaḥ || iti vārāha-vacanāt |
GE07bhg4c12u:371: tayā vinā tad āpnoti naro nārāyaṇāśrayaḥ || iti nārāyaṇīyāt |
GE07bhg4c12u:373: sukhena yāṃ gatiṃ yānti na tāṃ sarve 'pi dhārmikāḥ || iti pādmāc ca
GE07bhg4c12u:375: mayy eva mana ādhatsva mayi buddhiṃ niveśaya |
GE07bhg4c12u:376: nivasiṣyasi mayy eva ata ūrdhvaṃ na saṃśayaḥ ||8||
GE07bhg4c12u:377: śrīdharaḥ - yasmād evaṃ tasmāt mayy eveti |
GE07bhg4c12u:378: mayy eva saṅkalpa-vikalpātmakaṃ mana ādhatsva sthirīkuru |
GE07bhg4c12u:379: buddhim api vyavasāyātmikāṃ mayy eva niveśaya |
GE07bhg4c12u:381: labdha-jñānaḥ san ata ata ūrdhvaṃ dehānte mayy eva nivasiṣyasi nivatsyasi
GE07bhg4c12u:384: yathā ca śrutiḥ dehānte devaḥ paraṃ brahmā tārakaṃ vyacaṣṭe iti ||8||
GE07bhg4c12u:385: madhusūdanaḥ - tad evam iyatā prabandhena saguṇopāsanāṃ stutvedānīṃ
GE07bhg4c12u:387: mayy eva saguṇe brahmaṇi manaḥ saṅkalpa-vikalpātmakam ādhatsva sthāpaya sarvā manovṛttīr mad-viṣayā eva kuru |
GE07bhg4c12u:388: eva-kārānuṣaṅgena mayy eva buddhim adhyavasāya-lakṣaṇāṃ niveśaya |
GE07bhg4c12u:389: sarvā buddhi-vṛttīr mad-viṣayā eva kuru, viṣayāntara-parityāgena sarvadā māṃ cintayety arthaḥ
GE07bhg4c12u:390: tataḥ kiṃ syād ity ata āha nivasiṣyasi nivatsyasi labdha-jñānaḥ san mad-ātmanā mayy eva śuddha ata ūrdhvam etad-dehānte na saṃśayo nātra pratibandha-śaṅkā kartavyety arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c12u:391: eva ata ūrdhvam ity atra sandhy-abhāvaḥ śloka-pūraṇārthaḥ ||8||
GE07bhg4c12u:392: viśvanāthaḥ --- yasmān mad-bhaktir eva śreṣṭhā tasmāt tvaṃ bhaktim eva
GE07bhg4c12u:393: kurv iti tām upadiśati mayy eveti tribhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c12u:395: | mayi śyāmasundare pītāmbare vanamālini mana ādhatsva mat-smaraṇaṃ kurv ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c12u:396: tathā buddhiṃ vivekavatīṃ niveśaya man-mananaṃ kurv ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c12u:398: tataś ca mayy eva nivasiṣyasīti chāndasam |
GE07bhg4c12u:401: baladevaḥ -- yasmād evaṃ tasmāt tvaṃ mayy eva na tu svātmani mana ādhatsva samāhitaṃ kuru
GE07bhg4c12u:403: evaṃ kurvāṇas tvaṃ mayy eva mama kṛṣṇasya sannidhāv eva nivatsyasi, na tu sa-niṣṭhavat sargādikam anubhavann aiśvarya-pradhānaṃ māṃ prāpsyasīty arthaḥ ||8||
GE07bhg4c12u:405: atha cittaṃ samādhātuṃ na śaknoṣi mayi sthiram |
GE07bhg4c12u:407: śrīdharaḥ - atrāśaktaṃ prati sugamopāyam āha atheti |
GE07bhg4c12u:408: sthiraṃ yathā bhavaty evaṃ mayi cittaṃ dhārayituṃ yadi śakto na bhavasi tarhi vikṣiptaṃ cittaṃ punaḥ punaḥ pratyāhṛtya mad-anusmaraṇa-lakṣaṇo yo 'bhyāsa-yogas
GE07bhg4c12u:413: bhāgavata-dharmānuṣṭhānaṃ tad-aśaktau sarva-karma-phala-tyāga iti trīṇi sādhanāni tribhiḥ ślokair vidhatte atheti |
GE07bhg4c12u:414: atha pakṣāntare sthiraṃ yathā syāt tathā cittaṃ samādhātuṃ sthāpayituṃ mayi na śaknoṣi cet tata ekasmin pratimādāv ālambane sarvataḥ samāhṛtya cetasaḥ punaḥ punaḥ sthāpanam abhyāsas tat-pūrvako yogaḥ samādhis tenābhyāsa-yogena mām āptum iccha
GE07bhg4c12u:416: he dhanañjaya ! bahūn śatrūn jitvā dhanam āhṛtavān asi
GE07bhg4c12u:417: rājasūyādy-artham ekaṃ manaḥ-śatruṃ jitvā tatva-jñāna-dhanam āhariṣyasīti na tavāścaryam iti sambodhanārthaḥ ||9||
GE07bhg4c12u:418: viśvanāthaḥ --- sākṣāt smaraṇāsamarthaṃ prati tat-prāpty-upāyam āha atheti |
GE07bhg4c12u:419: abhyāsa-yogenānyatrānyatra gatam api manaḥ punaḥ pratyāhṛtya mad-rūpa
GE07bhg4c12u:422: prākṛtatvād iti kutsita-rūpa-rasādiṣu calantyā manonadyās teṣu calanaṃ nirudhya atisubhadreṣu madīya-rūpa-rasādiṣu tac-calanaṃ śanaiḥ śanaiḥ sampādayety
GE07bhg4c12u:424: he dhanañjayeti bahūn śatrūn jitvā dhanam āhṛtavatā tvayā mano
GE07bhg4c12u:425: 'pi jitvā dhyāna-dhanaṃ grahītuṃ śakyam eveti bhāvaḥ ||9||
GE07bhg4c12u:426: baladevaḥ - nanu gaṅgeva yeṣāṃ mano-vṛtti-rodhavatī teṣāṃ tvat-prāptis
GE07bhg4c12u:427: tvarayā syān mama tu tādṛśī na tad-vṛttis tataḥ kathaṃ seti cet tatrāha atheti |
GE07bhg4c12u:428: sthiraṃ yathā syāt tathā mayi cittaṃ samyag anāyāsenādhātum arpayituṃ na śaknoṣi cet tato 'bhyāsa-yogena mām āptum iccha yatasva |
GE07bhg4c12u:429: tato 'nyatra gatasya manasaḥ pratyāhṛtya śanaiḥ śanair mayi sthāpanam abhyāsas tena manasi mat-pravaṇe sati mat-prāptiḥ sulabhā syād iti bhāvaḥ
GE07bhg4c12u:432: mad-artham api karmāṇi kurvan siddhim avāpsyasi ||10||
GE07bhg4c12u:433: śrīdharaḥ - yadi punar naivaṃ tatrāha abhyāsa iti |
GE07bhg4c12u:435: aśakto 'si tarhi mat-prīty-arthāni yāni karmāṇi ekādaśy-upavāsa-vrata-caryā-pūjā-nāma-saṅkīrtanādīni tad-anuṣṭhānam eva paramaṃ yasya tādṛśo bhava |
GE07bhg4c12u:436: evaṃ-bhūtāni karmāṇy api mad-arthaṃ kurvan mokṣaṃ prāpsyasi ||10||
GE07bhg4c12u:439: abhyāsāsamarthye mad-arthaṃ bhāgavata-dharma-saṃjñakāni karmāṇy api kurvan
GE07bhg4c12u:441: viśvanāthaḥ --- abhyāse 'pīti yathā pitta-dūṣitā rasanā matsyaṇḍikāṃ necchati |
GE07bhg4c12u:442: tathaivāvidyā-dūṣitaṃ manas tad-rūpādikaṃ madhuram api na
GE07bhg4c12u:443: gṛhṇātīty atas tena durgraheṇa mahā-prabalena manasā saha yoddhuṃ mayā naiva śakyata iti manyase ced iti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c12u:449: baladevaḥ - nanu vāyor iva manaso 'ticāpalyāt tasya pratyāhāre mama na śaktir iti cet tatrāha abhyāse 'pīti |
GE07bhg4c12u:450: ukta-lakṣaṇe 'bhyāse 'pi cet tvam asamarthas tarhi mat-karmāṇi paramāṇi pumartha-bhūtāni yasya tādṛśo bhava
GE07bhg4c12u:452: evaṃ sukarāṇi mad-arthāni karmāṇi kurvāṇas tvaṃ tatra
GE07bhg4c12u:456: athaitad apy aśakto 'si kartuṃ mad-yogam āśritaḥ |
GE07bhg4c12u:458: śrīdharaḥ - atyantaṃ bhagavad-dharma-pariniṣṭhāyām aśaktasya pakṣāntaram āha atheti |
GE07bhg4c12u:459: yady etad api kartuṃ na śaknoṣi tarhi mad-ayogaṃ
GE07bhg4c12u:460: mad-eka-śaraṇatvam āśritaḥ san sarveṣāṃ dṛṣṭādṛṣṭārthānām āvaśyakānāṃ cāgnihotrādi-karmaṇāṃ phalāni niyata-cittaṃ bhūs tvā parityaja |
GE07bhg4c12u:461: etad uktaṃ bhavati mayā tāvad īśvarājñayā yathā-śakti karmāṇi kartavyāni |
GE07bhg4c12u:462: phalaṃ tāvad dṛṣṭam adṛṣṭaṃ vā parameśvarādhīnam ity evaṃ mayi bhāram āropya phalāsaktiṃ parityajya vartamāno mat-prasādena kṛtārtho bhaviṣyasīti ||11||
GE07bhg4c12u:464: api kartuṃ na śaknoṣi, tato mad-yogaṃ mad-eka-śaraṇatvam āśrito mayi sarva-karma-samarpaṇaṃ mad-yogas taṃ vāśritaḥ san yatātmavān yataḥ saṃyata-sarvendriya ātmavān vivekī ca san sarva-karma-phala-tyāgaṃ kuru phalābhisandhiṃ tyajety arthaḥ ||11||
GE07bhg4c12u:465: viśvanāthaḥ --- etad api kartum aśaktaś cet tarhi mad-yogam āśrito mayi sarva-karma-samarpaṇam
GE07bhg4c12u:477: dvitīyaḥ śravaṇa-kīrtanātmakaṃ tu sarveṣāṃ sugama evopāyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c12u:480: etat-kṛtya-samarthā indriyāṇāṃ bhagavan-niṣṭhīkṛtāv aśraddhālavaś ca bhagavad-arpita-niṣkāma-karmiṇaḥ prathama-ṣaṭkotādhikāriṇo 'smān
GE07bhg4c12u:482: baladevaḥ - atha mahākulīnatva-loka-mukhyatvādinā pratibandhena bādhitas tvam anyo vai tan-man-niketa-vimārjanādi-mat-prītikara-mati-sukaram api karma cet kartum aśakto 'si tato mad-yogaṃ mac-charaṇatām āśritaḥ san sarveṣām anuṣṭhīyamānānāṃ karmaṇāṃ phala-tyāgaṃ kuru yatātmavān vijita-manā bhūtvā, tathā ca phalābhisandhi-śūnyair
GE07bhg4c12u:485: 'bhyudite sva-śeṣiṇi sarvottamatvena vidite śanaiḥ śanaiḥ parāpi bhaktiḥ
GE07bhg4c12u:487: evam eva vakṣyati yataḥ pravṛttir bhūtānāṃ ity ādinā mad-bhaktiṃ labhate parām ity anena
GE07bhg4c12u:489: śreyo hi jñānam abhyāsāj jñānād dhyānaṃ viśiṣyate |
GE07bhg4c12u:491: śrīdharaḥ - tam imaṃ phala-tyāgaṃ stauti śreya iti |
GE07bhg4c12u:495: tatas tu taṃ paśyati niṣkalaṃ dhyāyamāna iti śruteḥ |
GE07bhg4c12u:497: tasmād evaṃbhūtāt karma-phala-tyāgāt karmasu tat-phaleṣu cāsakti-nivṛttyā
GE07bhg4c12u:498: mat-prasādena ca samanantaram eva saṃsāra-śāntir bhavati ||12||
GE07bhg4c12u:501: śreyaḥ praśasyataraṃ hi eva jñānaṃ śabda-yuktibhyām ātma-niścayo 'bhyāsā jñānārtha-śravaṇābhyāsāt
GE07bhg4c12u:505: tad evaṃ sarva-sādhana-śreṣṭhaṃ dhyānaṃ tato 'py atiśayitatvenājña-kṛtaḥ
GE07bhg4c12u:509: puṃsā kṛtāt sarva-karma-phala-tyāgāc chāntir upaśamaḥ sa-hetukasya
GE07bhg4c12u:510: saṃsārasyānantaram apy avadhānena na tu kālāntaram apekṣate |
GE07bhg4c12u:512: yadā sarve pramucyante kāmā ye 'sya hṛdi sthitāḥ |
GE07bhg4c12u:513: atha martyo 'mṛto bhavaty atra brahma samaśnute ||
GE07bhg4c12u:514: ity ādi śrutiṣu prajahāti yadā kāmān sarvān ity ādi-sthita-prajña-lakṣaṇeṣu ca sarva-kāma-tyāgasyāmṛtatva-sādhanatvam
GE07bhg4c12u:519: iti, yathā vā jāmadagnyena brāhmaṇena niḥkṣatrā pṛthivī kṛteti
GE07bhg4c12u:522: viśvanāthaḥ --- athoktānāṃ smaraṇa-mananābhyāsānāṃ yathā-pūrvaṃ śraiṣṭhyaṃ spaṣṭīkṛyāha śreyo hīti |
GE07bhg4c12u:523: abhyāsāj jñānaṃ mayi buddhiṃ niveśayety uktaṃ
GE07bhg4c12u:525: abhyāse saty āyāsata eva dhyānaṃ syāt |
GE07bhg4c12u:526: manane sati tv anāyāsata eva dhyānam iti viśeṣāt tasmāt jñānād api dhyānaṃ viśiṣyate śreṣṭham ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c12u:527: kuta ity ata āha - dhyānāt karma-phalānāṃ
GE07bhg4c12u:532: pūrvaṃ tu bhaktānām ajāta-ratīnāṃ mokṣa-tyāgecchaiva bhavet |
GE07bhg4c12u:535: yad uktaṃ bhakti-rasāmṛta-sindhau - kleśa-ghnī śubhadā [BRS 1.1.7] ity atra ṣaḍbhiḥ
GE07bhg4c12u:540: na yoga-siddhīr apunar-bhavaṃ vā mayy arpitātmecchati mad vinānyat || [BhP 11.14.14] iti |
GE07bhg4c12u:542: tyāgād vaitṛṣṇyād anantaram eva śāntir mad-rūpa-guṇādikaṃ vinā sarva-viṣayeṣv evendriyāṇām uparatiḥ |
GE07bhg4c12u:543: atra pūrvārdhe śreyaḥ iti viśiṣyate iti pada-dvayenānvayād uttarārdhe tu anantaram ity anenaivānvayād eṣaiva vyākhyā samyag upapadyate nānyety avadheyam ||12||
GE07bhg4c12u:544: baladevaḥ - sukaratvād apramādatvāj jñāna-garbhatvāc cānibhisaṃhitaṃ phalaṃ karma-yogaṃ stauti śreyo hīti |
GE07bhg4c12u:547: paramātmopalabdhi-dvāratvāt jñānāc ca tasmād aniṣpannāt sādhana-bhūtaṃ
GE07bhg4c12u:548: dhyānaṃ svātma-cintana-lakṣaṇaṃ viśiṣyate sva-hitatve śreyo bhavati |
GE07bhg4c12u:549: dhyānāc ca tasmād aniṣpannāt karma-phala-tyāgād anantaraṃ śāntis tyakta-phalād anuṣṭhitā karmaṇo 'nantaraṃ manaḥ-śuddhir ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c12u:550: tathā ca śuddhe manasi dhyānaṃ niṣpadyate |
GE07bhg4c12u:554: tena parā bhaktis tayiśvarya-pradhānasya mama prāptir iti durgamo 'yam upāya iti bhāvaḥ
GE07bhg4c12u:555: na cāyam arjunaṃ praty upadeśas tasyaikāntitvāt |
GE07bhg4c12u:557: niṣkāma-karma-ratā hari-dhyāyinaś ca svātmānam anubhūya tato 'bhyuditayā
GE07bhg4c12u:558: hari-viṣayakatyā pāramaiśvarya-guṇayā parayā bhaktyā hariṃ premāspadam anubhavanto vimucyanta iti gītā-śāstrārtha-paddhatiḥ |
GE07bhg4c12u:561: adveṣṭā sarva-bhūtānāṃ maitraḥ karuṇa eva ca |
GE07bhg4c12u:564: mayy arpita-mano-buddhir yo mad-bhaktaḥ sa me priyaḥ ||14||
GE07bhg4c12u:565: śrīdharaḥ - evaṃ-bhūtasya bhaktasya kṣipram eva parameśvara-prasāda-hetūn
GE07bhg4c12u:567: sarva-bhūtānāṃ yathāyatham adveṣṭā maitraḥ karuṇaś ca |
GE07bhg4c12u:571: nirmamo nirahaṃkāraś ca kṛpālutvād eva anyaiḥ saha same duḥkha-sukhe yasya saḥ |
GE07bhg4c12u:578: evaṃbhūto yo mad-bhaktaḥ sa me priyaḥ ||14||
GE07bhg4c12u:580: pratyatiduṣkaratvenākṣaropāsana-nindayā sukaraṃ saguṇopāsanaṃ vidhāyāśakti-tāratamyānuvādenānyāny api sādhanāni vidadhau bhagavān vāsudevaḥ kathaṃ nu nāma sarva-pratibandha-rahitaḥ sann uttamādhikāritayā phala-bhūtāyām akṣara-vidyāyām avatared ity abhiprāyeṇa sādhana-vidhānasya
GE07bhg4c12u:587: bhagavatā patañjalinā coktaṃ samādhi-siddhir īśvara-praṇidhānāt iti |
GE07bhg4c12u:588: tataḥ pratyak-cetanādhigamo 'py antarāyābhāvaś ca iti ca |
GE07bhg4c12u:594: na hi nindā nindyaṃ nindituṃ pravartate 'pi tu vidheyaṃ stotum iti nyāyāt |
GE07bhg4c12u:596: priyo hi jñānino 'tyartham ahaṃ sa ca mama priyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c12u:597: udārāḥ sarva evaite jñānī tv ātmaiva me matam || [Gītā 7.17-18]
GE07bhg4c12u:598: ity ādinā punaḥ punaḥ praśastatamatayoktās teṣām eva jñānaṃ dharma-jātaṃ
GE07bhg4c12u:599: cānusaraṇīyam adhikāram āsādya tvayety arjunaṃ bubodhayiṣuḥ parama-hitaiṣī
GE07bhg4c12u:600: bhagavān abheda-darśinaḥ kṛta-kṛtyānakṣaropāsakān prastauti adveṣṭeti saptabhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c12u:601: sarvāṇi bhūtāny ātmatvena paśyann ātmano duḥkha-hetāv api
GE07bhg4c12u:602: pratikūla-buddhy-abhāvān na dveṣṭā sarva-bhūtānāṃ kintu maitrī snigdhatā
GE07bhg4c12u:604: yataḥ karuṇaḥ karuṇā duḥkhiteṣu dayā tadvān sarva-bhūtābhaya-dātā
GE07bhg4c12u:609: dveṣa-rāgayor apravartakatvena same duḥkha-sukhe yasya saḥ |
GE07bhg4c12u:610: ataeva kṣamī ākrośana-tāḍanādināpi na vikriyām āpadyate ||13||
GE07bhg4c12u:619: dṛḍhaḥ kutārkikair abhibhavitum aśakyatayā sthiro niścayo 'ham asmy akaartra-bhloktṛ-saccidānandādvitīyaṃ
GE07bhg4c12u:620: brahmety adhyavasāyo yasya sa dṛḍha-niścayaḥ sthita-prajña ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c12u:621: mayi bhagavati vāsudeve śuddhe brahmaṇi arpita-mano-buddhiḥ
GE07bhg4c12u:623: īdṛśo yo mad-bhaktaḥ śuddhākṣara-brahmavit sa me priyaḥ, mad-ātmatvāt ||14||
GE07bhg4c12u:624: viśvanāthaḥ --- etādṛśyāḥ śāntyā bhaktaḥ kīdṛśo bhavatīty apekṣāyāṃ
GE07bhg4c12u:626: adveṣṭā dviṣatsv api dveṣaṃ na karoti pratyuta mitro mitratayā vartate |
GE07bhg4c12u:627: karuṇa eṣām asad-gatir mā bhavatv iti buddhyā teṣu kṛpāluḥ |
GE07bhg4c12u:628: nanu kīdṛśena vivekena dviṣatsv api maitrī-kāruṇye syātām |
GE07bhg4c12u:629: tatra vivekaṃ vinaivety āha nirmamo nirahaṃkāra iti putra-kalatrādiṣu mamatvābhāvād dehe cāhaṅkārābhāvāt tasya mad-bhaktasya kvāpi dveṣa eva naiva phalati |
GE07bhg4c12u:630: kutaḥ punar dveṣa-janita-duḥkha-śānty-arthaṃ tena vivekaḥ svīkartavya iti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c12u:631: nanu tad apy anya-kṛta-pāduka-muṣṭi-prahārādibhir deha-vyathādīnaṃ duḥkhaṃ kiṃcid bhavaty eva ? tatrāha sama-duḥkha-sukham |
GE07bhg4c12u:642: nanv etādṛśasya bhaktasya jīvikā kathaṃ sidhyet ? tatrāha santuṣṭaḥ |
GE07bhg4c12u:643: yadṛcchopasthite kiṃcid yatnopasthite vā bhakṣya-vastuni santuṣṭaḥ |
GE07bhg4c12u:645: tat kathaṃ svabhakṣam ālakṣya santuṣṭa iti tatrāha satataṃ yogī bhakti-yoga-yukto bhakti-siddhārtham iti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c12u:648: tattvaṃ vimṛśyate tena tad vijñāya paraṃ vrajet || iti |
GE07bhg4c12u:649: kiṃ ca deivād aprāpta-bhaikṣyo 'pi yatātmā saṃyata-cittaḥ kṣobha-rahita
GE07bhg4c12u:653: eva me kartavyeti niścayas tasya na śithilībhavatīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c12u:654: sarvatra hetuḥ mayy arpita-mano-buddhir mat-smaraṇa-manana-parāyaṇa ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c12u:655: īdṛśo bhaktas tu me priyo mām atiprīṇayatīty arthaḥ ||13-14||
GE07bhg4c12u:657: saniṣṭhāṃś ca tat-tat-sādhana-bhedair upavarṇya teṣāṃ sarvoparañjakān
GE07bhg4c12u:659: sarva-bhūtānām adveṣṭā dveṣaṃ kurvatsv api teṣu mat-prārabhdānuguṇa-pareśa-preritāny amūni mahyaṃ dviṣantīti dveṣa-śūnyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c12u:661: kenacin nimittena khinneṣu mābhūd eṣāṃ kheda iti karuṇaḥ |
GE07bhg4c12u:662: dehādiṣu nirmamaḥ prakṛter amī vikārā na mameti teṣu mamatā-śūnyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c12u:664: sama-duḥkha-sukhaḥ sukhe sati harṣeṇa duḥkhe sati udvegena cāvyākulaḥ |
GE07bhg4c12u:670: aśakyatayā sthiro niścayo hareḥ kiṅkaro 'smīti adhyavasāyo yasya saḥ |
GE07bhg4c12u:672: evaṃ-bhūto yo mad-bhaktaḥ sa me priyaḥ
GE07bhg4c12u:675: yasmān nodvijate loko lokān nodvijate ca yaḥ |
GE07bhg4c12u:676: harṣāmarṣa-bhayodvegair mukto yaḥ sa ca me priyaḥ ||15||
GE07bhg4c12u:678: yasmāt sakāśāl loko jano nodvijate bhaya-śaṅkayā saṃkṣobhaṃ na prāpnoti |
GE07bhg4c12u:686: etair vimukto yo mad-bhaktaḥ sa ca me priyaḥ ||15||
GE07bhg4c12u:687: madhusūdanaḥ - punas tasyaiva viśeṣaṇāni yasmād iti |
GE07bhg4c12u:689: sarva-bhūtābhaya-dāyinaḥ saṃnyāsino hetor nodvijate na santapyate loko yaḥ kaścid api janaḥ
GE07bhg4c12u:694: kiṃ ca harṣaḥ svasya priya-lābhe romāñcāśru-pātādi-hetur
GE07bhg4c12u:700: udvega ekākī kathaṃ vijane sarva-parigraha-śūnyo jīviṣyāmīty evaṃvidho vyākulatā-rūpaś citta-vṛtti-viśeṣas tair harṣāmarṣa-bhayodvegair
GE07bhg4c12u:702: advaita-darśitayā tad-ayogyatvena tair eva svayaṃ parityakto na tu teṣāṃ tyāgāya svayaṃ vyāpṛta iti yāvat |
GE07bhg4c12u:704: īdṛśo mad-bhakto yaḥ sa me priya iti pūrvavat ||15||
GE07bhg4c12u:705: viśvanāthaḥ --- kiṃ ca yasyāsti bhaktir bhagavaty akiṃcanā sarvair guṇais tatra samāsate surāḥ [BhP 5.18.12] ity-ādy-ukter mat-prīti-janakā anye 'pi
GE07bhg4c12u:706: guṇā mad-bhaktyā muhur abhyastayā svata evotpadyante, tān api tvaṃ śṛṇv ity āha |
GE07bhg4c12u:708: harṣādibhIḥ prākṛtair harṣāmarṣa-bhayodvegair mukta ity ādinoktān api kāṃścid guṇān
GE07bhg4c12u:709: durlabhatva-jñāpanārthaṃ punar āha yo na hṛṣyatīti ||15||
GE07bhg4c12u:710: baladevaḥ - yasmāl lokaḥ ko 'pi jano nodvijate bhaya-śaṅkayā kṣobhaṃ na labhate |
GE07bhg4c12u:711: yaḥ kāruṇikatvāj janodvejakaṃ karma na karoti |
GE07bhg4c12u:712: lokāc ca yo nodvijate sarvāvirodhitva-viniścayād yad-udvejakaṃ karma loko na karoti |
GE07bhg4c12u:713: yaś ca harṣādibhiḥ kartṛbhir mukto, na tu teṣāṃ mocane svayaṃ vyāpārī |
GE07bhg4c12u:718: kathaṃ nirudyamasya mama jīvanam iti vikṣobhas tūdvegaḥ |
GE07bhg4c12u:722: sarvārambha-parityāgī yo mad-bhaktaḥ sa me priyaḥ ||16||
GE07bhg4c12u:729: sarvān dṛṣṭādṛṣṭārthān ārambhānudyamān parityaktuṃ śīlaṃ yasya saḥ |
GE07bhg4c12u:731: san yo mad-bhaktaḥ sa me priyaḥ ||16||
GE07bhg4c12u:733: nirapekṣaḥ sarveṣu bhogopakaraṇeṣu yadṛcchopanīteṣv api niḥspṛhaḥ |
GE07bhg4c12u:735: dakṣa upasthiteṣu jñātavyeṣu kartavyeṣu ca sadya eva jñātuṃ kartuṃ ca samarthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c12u:736: udāsīno na kasyacin mitrādeḥ pakṣaṃ bhajate yaḥ |
GE07bhg4c12u:738: parais tāḍyamānasyāpi gatā notpannā vyathā pīḍā yasya saḥ |
GE07bhg4c12u:739: utpannāyām api vyathāyām apakarṛṣv anapakartṛtvaṃ kṣamitvam |
GE07bhg4c12u:740: vyathā-kāraṇeṣu satsv apy anutpanna-vyathatvaṃ gata-gata-vyathatvam iti bhedaḥ |
GE07bhg4c12u:741: aihikāmuṣmika-phalāni sarvāṇi karmāṇi sarvārambhās tān parityaktuṃ śīlaṃ
GE07bhg4c12u:742: yasya sa sarvārambha-parityāgī sannyāsī yo mad-bhaktaḥ sa me priyaḥ ||16||
GE07bhg4c12u:745: sarvān vyavahārikān dṛṣṭādṛṣṭārthāṃs tathā pāramārthikān api kāṃścit śāstrādhyāpanādīn ārambhān udyamān parihartuṃ śīlaṃ yasya saḥ ||16||
GE07bhg4c12u:746: baladevaḥ - anapekṣaḥ svayam āgate 'pi bhogye nispṛhaḥ |
GE07bhg4c12u:754: yo na hṛṣyati na dveṣṭi na śocati na kāṅkṣati |
GE07bhg4c12u:755: śubhāśubha-parityāgī bhaktimān yaḥ sa me priyaḥ ||17||
GE07bhg4c12u:761: śubhāśubhe puṇya-pāpe parityaktuṃ śīlaṃ yasya saḥ |
GE07bhg4c12u:763: bhūtvā yo mad-bhaktimān sa me priyaḥ ||17||
GE07bhg4c12u:766: yo na hṛṣyatīṣṭa-prāptau, na dveṣṭi aniṣṭa-prāptau na śocati prāpteṣṭa-viyoge |
GE07bhg4c12u:768: sarvārambha-parityāgīty etad vivṛṇoti śubhāśubhe sukha-sādhana-duḥkha-sādhane karmaṇī parityaktuṃ śīlam asyeti
GE07bhg4c12u:769: śubhāśubha-parityāgī bhaktimān yaḥ sa me priyaḥ ||17||
GE07bhg4c12u:771: baladevaḥ - yaḥ priyaṃ putra-śiṣyādi prāpya na hṛṣyati |
GE07bhg4c12u:772: apriyaṃ tat prāpya tatra na dveṣṭi |
GE07bhg4c12u:778: samaḥ śatrau ca mitre ca tathā mānāpamānayoḥ |
GE07bhg4c12u:781: aniketaḥ sthira-matir bhaktimān me priyo naraḥ ||19||
GE07bhg4c12u:783: śatrau ca mitre ca sama eka-rūpaḥ |
GE07bhg4c12u:796: evaṃ-bhūto bhaktimān yaḥ sa naro mama priyaḥ ||19||
GE07bhg4c12u:807: | te duḥkha-sukhājanakatayā tulye yasya sa tathā |
GE07bhg4c12u:809: nanu śarīra-yātrā-nirvāhāya vāg-vyāpāro 'pekṣita eva nety āha saṃtuṣṭo
GE07bhg4c12u:814: īdṛśo yo bhaktimān sa me priyo naraḥ |
GE07bhg4c12u:815: atra punaḥ punar bhakter upādānaṃ bhaktir evāpavargasya puṣkalaṃ kāraṇam iti draḍhayitum ||19||
GE07bhg4c12u:819: | tulyeti nindayā duḥkhaṃ stutyā sukhaṃ ca yo na vindati |
GE07bhg4c12u:822: yena kenacid adṛṣṭākṛṣṭena rukṣeṇa snigdhena vānnādinā santuṣṭaḥ |
GE07bhg4c12u:825: eṣv adveṣṭety ādiṣu saptasu yeṣu guṇānāṃ punar apy abhidhānaṃ tat teṣām atidaurlabhya-jñāpanārtham ity adoṣaḥ |
GE07bhg4c12u:826: san-niṣṭhādīnāṃ tri-vidhānāṃ bhaktānāṃ sambhūya sthitā ete 'dveṣṭṛtvādayo
GE07bhg4c12u:829: ye tu dharmyāmṛtam idaṃ yathoktaṃ paryupāsate |
GE07bhg4c12u:830: śraddadhānā mat-paramā bhaktās te 'tīva me priyāḥ ||20||
GE07bhg4c12u:831: śrīdharaḥ : uktaṃ dharma-jātaṃ sapahalam upasaṃharati ye tv iti |
GE07bhg4c12u:847: ayatnato bhavanty eva na tu sādhana-rūpiṇaḥ || iti |
GE07bhg4c12u:849: tad idaṃ dharma-jātaṃ prayatnena sampādyamānaṃ mumukṣor mokṣa-sādhanaṃ bhavatīti pratipādayann upasaṃharati ye tv iti |
GE07bhg4c12u:850: ye tu saṃnyāsino mumukṣavo dharmāmṛtaṃ dharma-rūpam amṛta-sādhanatvād amṛtavad āsvādyatvād
GE07bhg4c12u:851: yathoktam adveṣṭā sarva-bhūtānām ity ādinā pratipāditaṃ paryupāsate
GE07bhg4c12u:852: 'nutiṣṭhanti prayatnena śraddadhānāḥ santo mat-paramā ahaṃ bhagavān akṣarātmā vāsudeva eva paramaḥ prāptavyo niratiśayā gatir yeṣāṃ te
GE07bhg4c12u:853: mat-paramā bhaktā māṃ nirupādhikaṃ brahma bhajamānās te 'tīva me priyāḥ |
GE07bhg4c12u:854: priyo hi jñānino 'tyartham ahaṃ sa ca mama priyaḥ iti pūrva-sūcitasyāyam
GE07bhg4c12u:856: yasmād dharmāmṛtam idaṃ śraddhayānutiṣṭhan bhagavato viṣṇoḥ parameśvarasyātīva priyo bhavati tasmād idaṃ jñānavataḥ
GE07bhg4c12u:857: svabhāva-siddhatayā lakṣaṇam api mumukṣuṇātma-tattva-jijñāsunātma-jñānopāyatvena yatnād anuṣṭheyaṃ viṣṇoḥ
GE07bhg4c12u:867: viśvanāthaḥ : uktavān bahuvidha-svabhakta-niṣṭhān dharmān upasaṃharan kārtsnyenaital-lipsūnāṃ tac-chravaṇa-vicāraṇādi-phalam āha ye tv iti |
GE07bhg4c12u:869: bhakty-uttha-śānty-uttha-dharmā na prākṛtā guṇāḥ bhaktyā tuṣyati kṛṣṇo na guṇaiḥ ity ukta-koṭitaḥ
GE07bhg4c12u:872: ete tu tat-tat-sarva-sal-lakṣaṇepsavaḥ sādhakā api tebhyaḥ siddhebhyo 'pi śreṣṭhāḥ |
GE07bhg4c12u:880: baladevaḥ : ukta-bhakti-yogam upasaṃharan tasmin niṣṭhā-phalam āha ye tv
GE07bhg4c12u:882: ye bhaktā yathoktaṃ mayy āveśya mano ye mām ity ādibhir yathā-gatam
GE07bhg4c12u:884: prāpyaṃ mām iva prāpakaṃ tat samāśrayanti |
GE07bhg4c12u:885: śraddadhānā bhakti-śraddhā-lavo mat-paramā man-niratās te mamātīva priyā
GE07bhg4c12u:887: vaśaḥ svaika-juṣāṃ kṛṣṇaḥ sva-bhakty-eka-juṣāṃ tu saḥ |
